name: Feed the Bunyip
description:
Hello fellow Bunyip! Welcome to the Swamp. 

What?!? You don't remember how to EAT ? Well, let me catch you up to speed...

Feed the Bunyip is a game where you have to control the very sensitive and non-automatic digestive system of a mythical creature called the "Bunyip". 

The Bunyip likes to eat humans and so you have to help him slowly eat and digest it's food so it can be satisfied.

Controls

For this game, you need an Xbox Controller.

Move lower jaw: left analog stick

Move Upper Jaw: back right trigger

Chomp: press "A"

Move through esophagus: right analog stick

Open esophagus gate: press "X"

Release enzymes: press "Y"

Restart: press escape on the keyboard (not on the controller so you don't accidently ruin your gampleya :) )

Team:

Ivo Duarte (WorldSeed) - background, people, UI art, voice acting

João Pamplona (BeastieBaiter) - bunyip controls, UI and tutorials

Maria Gomes (Karane) - bunyip controls, debugging, UI and tutorials

Nuno Baptista (nunobaptista57) - bunyip, color design, sound design, voice acting

Ricardo Subtil (rsubtil) - bunyip controls and debugging

Honorable Mentions

Gonçalo Goulão (goncalogoulao) - voice acting (a lot of screaming)

We are part of GameDev Técnico - a student association of portuguese students who have a passion for game development. To check our other games, just check GDT's itch.io page!

This video game was created during the Nordic Game Jam 2023. The game was created within the time period of 48 hours and the themes: Bunyip, garlic and games.
